Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Koya', 3: 'Up to 90 percent of the action module is damaged...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: 'Just leave me here... Go and meet up with your team!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: '...As long as the Inver-Device is not damaged, I will be fine.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: 'I can fix my frame through recycling adjustments, then... restart.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "If you're going to restart yourself, everything that we experienced together will mean nothing!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "We'll both be surrounded by the Corrupted if you don't go... Listen to me! You gotta go!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "No, I won't leave you here no matter what you say.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'This is Kamui, this is Kamui, Kamui of First Team. Lucia? Watanabe? We need support, we need support, the coordinates are...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wave after wave of Corrupted flocked toward the struggling Koya.'}
{3: 'Koya reached out to Kamui with all his might.'}
{3: 'The pain of being torn apart can be felt in his cries of terror and despair.'}
{3: "In the end, Kamui could never grab Koya's hand."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui (?)', 3: 'Ah, shut up, you bunch of trash.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui (?)', 3: 'By a bunch of trash like you.', 4: '1'}
